title: DVD Copy Package
description: This is a very easy way to copy dvd,s.Included in the package is the latest DVD Decryptor, DVD Shrink, Fix VTS and Rip it for me. Simply install DvD Decryptor and DvD Shrink and copy Fix VTS and Rip it for me to your desktop. Then run Rip it for me and follow the instructions as you go. This package really does work on the newest copy protections.I have tried a lot of copy programs and these have produced the best quality for me. Enjoy!!!
